title: Credit Funding Specialist – High-Limit Credit Card Approvals ($10K+)
job_overview:
I’m looking for an experienced credit funding virtual assistant who can help secure high-limit personal credit card approvals (preferably $10,000+ limits). You must know how to:
 • Analyze tri-bureau credit reports (IdentityIQ, Experian, Credit Karma, etc.)
 • Use soft-pull/prequalification tools for major credit cards (Amex, Navy Federal, Capital One, Discover, etc.)
 • Recommend and apply for the right cards based on the client’s profile
 • Know which banks give instant approvals with no income docs required
 • Help prepare and submit applications with high approval success
 • Track approvals and help clients build credit card stacking strategies
 • Knowledge of AU trade lines, credit score boosting, and inquiry management is a plus
 • Must have experience using tools like Credit Repair Cloud, Letterstream, Experian, MyFICO, or Nav

This is a long-term role for someone familiar with Metro 2, FCRA, and funding-based credit work — not just traditional credit repair.
